Introduction

Hyerim (also known simply as Lim) is a South Korean singer, actress and composer currently under Wave Entertainment. She is a former member of the girl group Wonder Girls.

Coinciding with Sunmi's departure from Wonder Girls, JYP Entertainment announced on January 22, 2010 that Hyelim would be joining Wonder Girls as a new member.


On January 26, 2017, JYP Entertainment announced the group would be disbanding after Yeeun and Sunmi decided not to renew their contracts with the agency. Meanwhile, Hyelim and Yubin renewed their contracts.

On January 28, 2020, JYP Entertainment announced that she, alongside fellow former Wonder Girls member Yubin, decided to leave the agency following the expiration of their contracts three days prior.

On March 9, 2020, it was announced that she had signed on with Yubin's newly established agency rrr Entertainment.

When Hyerim once interviewed Leonardo Dicaprio, he said he was a fan of the Wonder Girls and their "Reboot" album
…
2
Hyerim has sung guide songs for TWICE in the past
…
3
Hyerim used to model in Hong Kong
…
4
Hyerim promoted as JYP Sisters or Chinese Wonder Girls with missA's Fei & Jia and two other girls who eventually left the group. This lead to Fei & Jia's debut with missA and Hyerim's addition to the Wonder Girls in 2010
…
5
Before the wedding, the couple shared their love story through MBC’s “Don’t Be Jealous,” and some Wonder Girls members also reunited to celebrate the special occasion.
…
6
She is married to taekwondo athlete Shin Min Chul who she dated since 2013.
…
7
Hyerim spent 14 years living in Hong Kong in her youth
…
8
Hyerim and her fiancé held a private wedding ceremony in the Gangnam District of Seoul on July 5 (2020). Due to concerns surrounding the COVID-19 outbreak, the attendees were limited to family members, relatives, her fellow Wonder Girls members, and other
